attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I protest should there be any plans to remove brittania from our british coins at any time, to much harm has been done to our way of life,and this seems to be yet another attempt to interfear for no good reason...
Please sign this petition and make Gordon Brown and others stand up for our way of life.

rejection.details:
Your title should be a call for action, not a statement / name.

Also, a similar petition already exists:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/50pence/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
